titleStmt.title: The case of the Vniversity of Oxford: or, The sad dilemma that all the members thereof are put to, either to be perjur'd, or destroy'd. In a letter sent from thence to Mr Selden, Burgesse of the University.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and bookseller's name from Wing.
"Probably a genuine appeal to John Selden, then representing the University in Parliament, to protect the University" -- Madan.
Annotation on Thomason copy E.443[19]: "May 18th"; on copy E.673[21]: "& 1652" following the imprint date. Reissued?.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
